response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its high value and importance to you, I propose a special introductory offer. For a limited time, you can acquire this product for $9,500. Please let me know if you're interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 9500}
